channel.title: No-ip help
channel.description: WTF is wrong with the DUC thing... i can login to my email on the no-ip.com site but when i try to doo it with the program is says "verify user and pass" and i know for a 100000% fact that it is the right info. someone help? I spend months getting my server ready for hosting and now a little problem like this comes along and fucks my whole chances. (sorry for launguage)...

item.title: No-ip help

item.description:

item.title: No-ip help
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

i have a question on this:
i have my DUC up and running, i connected to my ip, does this mean my server is online now? on my client and source(which i have edited) i put in my no-ip. does this mean if i give others my client they can log into my server?

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip help
item.dc:creator: @T4NN T4NN
item.description:
@T4NN wrote:

I actually found the problem so it’s good. i was on a non-administrative account on my computer and it wont load on it for some reason i just switched users

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip help
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

just try making a new no-ip user and password on whatever is hosting your compute or a vps dont make the no-ip on a different pc other than the one hosting because somehow no-ip gets tied with that ip adress

Read full topic
